byline.contributor: Ian Lovett reported from Los Angeles, and Richard Pérez-Peña from New York.
byline.original: By IAN LOVETT and RICHARD PÉREZ-PEÑA

abstract: Federal prosecutors charge Mariya Chernykh and Tatiana and Syed Raheel Farook for their roles in creating fraudulent marriage meant to circumvent immigration laws; Syed Raheel is brother to Syed Rizwan Farook, one of attackers in San Bernardino, Calif, terrorist attack, but prosecutors do not believe he, his wife or his wife's sister knew about attacks beforehand.

headline.print_headline: 3 Tied to San Bernardino Gunman Are Indicted Over Roles in a Sham Marriage
headline.main: 3 Tied to San Bernardino Gunman Are Indicted

snippet: The investigation into the San Bernardino massacre produced criminal charges on Thursday against three people tied to one of the gunmen, Syed Rizwan Farook.
lead_paragraph: The investigation into the San Bernardino massacre produced criminal charges on Thursday against three people tied to one of the gunmen, Syed Rizwan Farook.
